[code]Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading (Servername)
To fix this try the following (in order):

  1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
  2. Try Clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options
  3. Try using a different game-world
  4. Try rebooting your computer
  5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu. [/code]

item.title: Adding All Godsword Graphics 100%
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

Step 2: Adding the Animations Go to Class20.

Below

Code:
if(aClass20Array351[j] == null)
aClass20Array351[j] = new Class20();
aClass20Array351[j].method259(true, class30_sub2_sub2);
add

Code:
if(j == 3001){
int[] frames = {2,2,2,2,26,13,40,27,21,39,17,17,38,22,36,23,57,50,25,16,11,12,33,7,30,42,9,46,4,19};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 3;
}
}
if(j == 3002){
int[] frames = {29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29005,29017,29003,29013,29018,29006,29015,29016,29012,29008,29004,29009,29002,29014,29011,29001,29000,29010,29007,29007,29007};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 3;
}
}
if(j == 3003){
int[] frames = {0,33,8,4,15,2,23,28,22,25,24,30,32,6,11,17,7,20,21,27,3,13,9,18,34,29,19,16,5,26,31,28,28,1};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = 29100+frames[i2];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 3;
}
}
if(j == 3004){
int[] frames = { 44, 44, 44, 44, 44, 44, 44, 44, 44, 35, 28, 23, 38, 25, 30, 43, 32, 5, 27, 4, 13, 0, 24, 3, 1, 37, 12, 17, 18, 33};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+29150;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 3;
}
}

Okay this couldnt possiably be that hard if you get errors in your compiler go to the top of the compiler and it well tell you where there is coming from what the error is and even sometimes how to fix it
